titleInfo.title: Louie Brooks, Larry Songbird and Christine Kittrell at the Elks Hall

mods.abstract: Three color window card (black and red on yellow) announcing Louie Brooks, Larry Songbird, and Christine Kittrell at the Elk's Hall on September 23. Poster features metal photoplates of Louie Brooks, Larry Songbird, and Christine Kittrell.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
